Articles.Content:
So desided id have a go at creating my own version of the Tornado from the Sonic games after my ok try at replicating the tornado 2 from the Sonic-X anime. So here comes the Tornado 5, a more modern and sleek looking version of the tornado line of bi-planes. I am just in love with this aircrafts looks and especially at just how well it flyes, pretty much the perfect aerobatic aircraft . There are also picks for the transformed version of it, it looks pretty good but is pretty much uncontrollable and i couldnt make it fly any better . NOTE: the flag that you see pasted in these aircrafts is not made by me but by nintendrawer of Deviantart, and i love it . And yes i am a huge fan of tails .

So here are some picks of the Tornado 5.

http://i.imgur.com/mQD1JJw.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/8iZni93.jpg

Here is a pick of the transformed version.

http://i.imgur.com/IKmnpbN.jpg

And here is a pick of the Tornado 2.5

http://i.imgur.com/1I2wjSK.jpg

So yea, there it is for you. I have been planning on making my own Tails flag at some point. I hope you enjoy these little contraptions that i have created .

And here is a link to the picture in the flag: http://nintendrawer.deviantart.com/art/tails-sheet-151285410

Edited October 11, 2015 by kapteenipirk
Hi kapteenipirk. To show pictures on our forum, you will need to upload your screenshots to a hosting site such as Imgur.com, and copy the link they provide into your posts.
